description: Numbers n such that representation in base 12 has same number of 7's and 9's.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..100] | Multiplicity(S,7) eq Multiplicity(S,9) where S is {*d: d in Intseq(n,12)*}]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Oct 20 2012
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
extensions: An incorrect g.f. was deleted by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 13 2009
